<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">2d27542157253110e1e0481e62bab721</macroponent><name>data_row_3_data</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "{0} out of 5",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    const input = api.data.evam_popular_articles.compositeDataViews;
    for (var i = 0; i < input.items.length; i++) {
        var model = input.items[i].propValues;
        if (model.model.rating != "") {
            model.detailValueTwo = helpers.translateSync("{0} out of 5", model.model.rating);
        }
    }
    return input;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-27 15:22:47</sys_created_on><sys_id>692754214c253110d8096f9a5cd3d615</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>data_row_3_data</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Plants" source="x_snc_plants_db">a474e7718792d510ab680f65dabb3508</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Plants">a474e7718792d510ab680f65dabb3508</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_692754214c253110d8096f9a5cd3d615</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-27 15:22:47</sys_updated_on><target/><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
